00029 #ifndef __SDLWindow_H__
00030 #define __SDLWindow_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgreSDLPrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreRenderWindow.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre {
00036     class _OgrePrivate SDLWindow : public RenderWindow
00037     {
00038     private:
00039         SDL_Surface* mScreen;
00040         bool mActive;
00041         bool mClosed;
00042             
00043         // Process pending events
00044         void processEvents(void);
00045 
00046         int (*glXGetVideoSyncSGI) (unsigned int *);
00047         int (*glXWaitVideoSyncSGI) (int, int, unsigned int *);
00048 
00049     public:
00050         SDLWindow();
00051         ~SDLWindow();
00052 
00053         void create(const String& name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00054                 bool fullScreen, const NameValuePairList *miscParams);
00056         void destroy(void);
00058         bool isActive(void) const;
00060         bool isClosed(void) const;
00062         void reposition(int left, int top);
00064         void resize(unsigned int width, unsigned int height);
00066         void swapBuffers(bool waitForVSync);
00067 
00069         void copyContentsToMemory(const PixelBox &dst, FrameBuffer buffer);
00070         
00073         void getCustomAttribute( const String& name, void* pData )
00074         {
00075             // NOOP
00076         }
00077 
00078         bool requiresTextureFlipping() const { return false; }
00079 
00080         bool isFullScreen(void) const
00081         {
00082             return ( mScreen->flags & SDL_FULLSCREEN ) == SDL_FULLSCREEN;
00083         }
00084     };
00085 }
